Silence from Carbonite as its Stock Price Tanks

What did they think would happen when so many of Rush fan's subscribed to Carbonite due to his live spots for them?

Oh course they were going to lose a huge amount of business by dropping his show. As they should.

The free market is about individual actors exercising choice.

Rush was saying on his website that several of the advertisers who canceled their contract with Rush have been asking to come back!!! Priceless!!!

Clearing up misinformation on our sponsors:

http://www.rushlimbaugh.com/daily/2012/03/07/clearing_up_misinformation_on_our_sponsors

"Two of the sponsors who have canceled have asked to return.  We are being very careful about that.  Not gonna give you any names here.  One of them is practically begging to come back.  Everything is fine on the business side.  Everything's cool."

You just made trickdaddy cry like a 2 year old, after reading that - thunderbum.
